author: FARA
install_msg: AssetManager loaded. It will keep assets.db fresh on a schedule. Use [p]assets reload to run now.
name: AssetManager
short: Keeps a local MissionChief assets DB in sync and searchable.
description: Fetches LSSM i18n (en_US) for vehicles/equipment/schoolings/buildings, stores in SQLite, adds fuzzy/FTS search, and runs on an internal schedule.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores no personal user data. It only maintains game asset metadata in a local SQLite database.
